Uses of Package
org.guicebox.failover

Packages that use org.guicebox.failover
org.guicebox.failover   
org.guicebox.failover.udp   
 

Classes in org.guicebox.failover used by org.guicebox.failover
ApplicationName
          The name of the application.
Environment
          The name of the environment.
Heart
          Sends and receives heartbeats to advertise this node's presence and detect the presence of other nodes in the cluster.
Heartbeat
          A heartbeat message, containing the application (cluster) name, node status and process fingerprint.
HeartbeatListener
          Listener interface for Heart.
Localhost
          The IP address of this machine.
Node
          The unique fingerprint of a node process in the cluster.
Ping
          Confirms availability of a specified network address.
PingListener
          Listener interface for Ping.
ProcessId
          A globally unique identifier for the running process.
TransportException
          Generic exception indicating that an error occurred while attempting to send/receive a heartbeat.
WellKnownAddress
          The hostname or IP address of the machine to ping.
 

Classes in org.guicebox.failover used by org.guicebox.failover.udp
FailoverModule
          Binds Failover as the Cluster implementation.
Heartbeat
          A heartbeat message, containing the application (cluster) name, node status and process fingerprint.
Transport
          Interface to the physical transport layer for broadcast distribution of Heartbeats to other nodes on the network.
TransportException
          Generic exception indicating that an error occurred while attempting to send/receive a heartbeat.
